pullrequest.title: Detec zmq under Windows using a FindZmq module

content.raw:
I used zmq x64 binary packages provided in the zmq page. Be use to source vcvarsall with the command `vcvarsall.bat amd64` and to have installed the full version of Visual Studio and not just the Express ([it seems not provide support to compile x64](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/7da6c3a6-9008-43f6-ac1d-8affc353455b/amd64-directory-missing-for-vcvarsallbat?forum=visualstudiogeneral)).

The cmake launch command should be something like:

`cmake .. -G"Visual Studio 12 Win64" -DZeroMQ_ROOT_DIR="C:\Program Files\ZeroMQ 4.0.4"`
content.html:
I used zmq x64 binary packages provided in the zmq page. Be use to source vcvarsall with the command vcvarsall.bat amd64 and to have installed the full version of Visual Studio and not just the Express (it seems not provide support to compile x64).

The cmake launch command should be something like:

cmake .. -G"Visual Studio 12 Win64" -DZeroMQ_ROOT_DIR="C:\Program Files\ZeroMQ 4.0.4"
